titles.title: Veterans Jobs Opportunity Act of 2009
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an incentive to hire unemployed veterans.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/16/2009--Introduced. Veterans Jobs Opportunity Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a work opportunity tax credit for the hiring in 2009 or 2010 of unemployed veterans discharged from active duty during 2008, 2009, or 2010.
